comment: You have quizzes, certificates and a group simulation project. He gives you everything you need to succeed. The simulation can be difficult but you learn a lot through it and it is fun. The quizzes are super easy and the certificates are helpful and look good on LinkedIn.
The content you learn will help you in and outside of this class. Super fun and very engaging class. Just make sure you do the work and you will do well.
He uses a simulation in his class and it is very helpful to actually learning something! He also has no exams just quizzes, certifications, and simulation.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: Take this class with Patrick! He is an excellent professor; you will learn a great deal that will be useful in the real world. Throughout the semester, there is a group project that simulates a real business, hubspot and google certificates, and simple weekly quizzes. Easy A. Make an effort. Not amndatory but worth going to class.

He has a long track history dealing with marketing and that makes for great feedback on assignments. There is a lot of work to be done with this class, but it is relatively easy and there is ample time to do the assignments. Lots of certs with hubspot and google analytics, but nothing too strenuous. Group project is semester long but not horrible.

Prof. Patrick Van Esch's class was fantastic! He had a passion for staying on the cutting edge of technology and its impact on the global marketplace. The simulation added an extra layer of excitement, and the professor made complex topics easy to understand. Highly recommend!

He has a fantastic sense of humor that keeps the class entertaining, but at the same time, he's incredibly knowledgeable. He challenges his students with simulations that bring the material to life.I would say that this professor strikes the perfect balance between being funny and educational, and I would highly recommend taking one of his classes.

If you want both an engaging class experience plus a ton of useable information in the marketing field, this is the professor for you. He is quite the character, but I mean that in the best way possible. Clearly defined classwork with Hubspot certs and quizzes, interesting competitive simulation, and useful case study lectures. Take him!

This class is very clearly graded, everything is outlined. There is a semester-long business simulation that is done in a group. There is also a simulation test that goes along with it. There are also HubSpot and Google Ad certificates that must be completed. Also there are 12 easy quizzes. Professor is hilarious and teaches real world scenarios.
rating_tags: Group projects--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback
